sentences.en: " No, dear,'she said, " it won't sell high till we've had the first semi - annual dividend.
sentences.cn: “ 不行, 亲爱的, ” 她说, “ 在咱们分到头半年的红利以前,股票卖不出好价钱.

sentences.en: dividend payments of 50 cents a share
Good eating habits will pay dividends later on in life.
sentences.cn: 保持良好的饮食习惯，将来会受益的。

sentences.en: Happiness is the dividend earned on a well - invested life.
sentences.cn: 快乐是生命美好投资,所赚取的红利.

sentences.en: He just read about that no - dividend deal.
sentences.cn: 他刚看完了不付股息的通知.

sentences.en: If one owned 100 shares, the dividend would be $ 200.
sentences.cn: 如有人持有100份股票, 可得红利200美元.

sentences.en: In 4 divided by 2, the number 2 is the divisor and 4 is the dividend.
sentences.cn: 在4被2除中, 2是除数,4是被除数.

sentences.en: Swimming is a fun, and gives you the dividend of better health.
sentences.cn: 游泳既是娱乐, 又有增进健康的好处.

sentences.en: The company was forced to pass its dividend.
sentences.cn: 该公司被迫到期不分红.

sentences.en: The dividend pay be equivalent to one quarter of the pretax profit.
sentences.cn: 所付股息相当于税前利润的四分之一.

sentences.en: The divisor is subtracted from the dividend.
The final dividend will be held at 20.7p, after an 8 per cent increase.
sentences.cn: 增长了8%后，最终的红利将会保持在20.7便士的水平。

sentences.en: The first quarter dividend has been increased by nearly 4 percent.
sentences.cn: 第一季度的股息增加了近4％。

sentences.en: The high yields available on the dividend shares made them attractive to private investors.
sentences.cn: 红利股票的高收益率对私人投资者极具吸引力。

sentences.en: The more significant synthetic dividend of this simple process is reaped.
sentences.cn: 可以从这个简单反应中得到在合成上更有意义的收获.

sentences.en: You may get the dividend, but possibly not the capital appreciation.
sentences.cn: 你或许能 得到红利，但是资本可能不会增值。

phrases.tran_cn: 股息生息率（每股股利与目前价格的比率）

trans.tran_en: a part of a company’s profit that is divided among the people with  share s  in the company
